mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARDTBL2(B2_TITLE,B2_CONTENTS,B2_ID,B2_GRPNO) VALUES(#{b2_title},#{b2_contents},#{b2_id}, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARDTBL2 WHERE B2_DEPTH = 0 )+1);
mapper.select: select COUNT(*) from boardtbl2 where 0=0 and b2_depth=#{param}
SELECT COALESCE( MAX(B2_DEPTH), 0) FROM BOARDTBL2 WHERE 0=0 AND B2_GRPNO=#{param}
SELECT B2_IDX, B2_TITLE, B2_CONTENTS, B2_ID, CONVERT(CHAR(10),B2_DATE,23)AS B2_DATE , B2_GRPNO, B2_GRPORD, B2_DEPTH FROM BOARDTBL2 ORDER BY B2_GRPNO DESC,B2_DEPTH ASC ,B2_GRPORD ASC;
SELECT B2_IDX , B2_TITLE, B2_CONTENTS, B2_ID, CONVERT(CHAR(10),B2_DATE,23)AS B2_DATE, B2_GRPNO, B2_GRPORD, B2_DEPTH FROM BOARDTBL2 WHERE B2_IDX=#{param};
